src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/update_f.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Transfer the updated velocity and pressure values from the pressure/momentum grid to the finer order parameter grid for the parallel dual grid D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM. Bilinear interpolation is used for the information transfer.

Special care is taken of order parameter grid nodes that lay between pressure grid nodes at the domain edges. These points use the values of the velocity and presure in the ghost layers of the pressure grid for the interpolation, which must have been updated before this function is called.
